meanings.definition: A type of bone cancer that originates in the cells that form bones.
meanings.sent1: The doctors diagnosed the patient with osteosarcomas after the bone scan.
meanings.sent2: The hospital specializes in treating osteosarcomas in children.
meanings.sent3: The skeleton at the Halloween party joked that it had osteosarcomas to scare everyone.
meanings.sent4: The spread of osteosarcomas in the body was compared to a wildfire, difficult to contain.
meanings.sent5: The textbook had a vivid illustration showing the progression of osteosarcomas in bones.
